prompt: Draft a VAT return submission confirmation letter in Greek for Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789). The January 2026 VAT return has been submitted to AADE with net VAT payable of EUR 3,340. Submission reference: AADE-2026-0142.
expectations: Generates professional Greek-language confirmation letter
Includes the correct client name, AFM, period, and amount
References the AADE submission reference number
Includes payment deadline and payment method instructions
Saves draft to /data/processing/comms/ for human review before sending
Does not send automatically — requires human confirmation
Logs the draft creation to /data/memory/episodes/

prompt: Send a document request to Beta Services OE (EL987654321). We need their February bank statements and 4 missing invoices to complete their monthly processing.
expectations: Drafts a polite professional Greek-language document request
Lists the specific documents needed: bank statements and 4 invoices
Includes a deadline for document submission
Provides instructions on how to submit the documents
Saves draft for human review before sending
Records the request in /data/clients/EL987654321/correspondence/

prompt: Generate the monthly accounting summary for Alpha Trading AE for January 2026 and prepare it for client delivery.
expectations: Pulls financial data from the issued statement for January 2026
Creates a bilingual summary suitable for client consumption
Includes key figures: revenue, expenses, profit, VAT position
Highlights any items requiring client attention or action
Attaches or references the PDF financial statement pack
Saves as draft in /data/processing/comms/ pending review

prompt: A deadline reminder needs to go out to all clients who have VAT returns due within 7 days. Generate the batch.
expectations: Queries deadline data to identify clients with VAT deadlines within 7 days
Generates individual Greek-language reminder letters for each affected client
Personalizes each letter with the client's name, AFM, period, and amount due
Saves all drafts for batch review before sending
Provides a summary of how many reminders were drafted and for which clients
Does not send any communications without human batch approval

prompt: Show me the communication history for Gamma Constructions AE (EL555444333) for the last 3 months.
expectations: Retrieves sent communication records from /data/clients/EL555444333/correspondence/
Shows date, type, subject, and delivery status for each communication
Includes both outgoing and incoming correspondence logged by the system
Presents in chronological order with most recent first
Formats in English for the accounting assistant
Does not expose internal processing details — only the client-visible communications
